name: PyQuil
description: A Python/GTK SQL query application. Allows you to inspect your databases and query them easily.

name: gevent-socketio
description: A WebSocket-like abstraction that enables real-time communication between a browser and a gevent server. I'm co-maintainer

name: SQLAlchemy Traversal
description: Automatically generate REST API from SQLAlchemy models

name: Hiero
description: Generic blog engine written in Pyramid, Mako, and SQLAlchemy

name: Horus
description: Generic user authentication and registration library for Pyramid

name: po2json
description: A small python script that converts gettext .po files to json objects

name: Snowjob
description: A cross platform (Linux, Mac, Windows, Android) script that makes your terminal snow. Python2 and Python3 compatible.

name: Pyramid Mustache
description: A Pyramid renderer for the mustache templating language. Allows you to share client and server templates

name: OAuth2 Client
description: A small OAuth2 client compatible with the final draft

name: OAuth2 Provider
description: A small OAuth2 generic provider compatible with the final draft, works with any web framework.

name: Pymemmon
description: A small python script that will monitor memory usage and kill processes if they reach the max. Can e-mail alerts.
